titleStmt.title: Severall votes of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. Declaring what forces shall be continued in the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales. As also, what regiments shall be disbanded. With the manner, and places appointed for the same. Ordered by the Lords, assembled in Parliament that these votes be forthwith printed and published. J. Brown, Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings head in the Old-baily,
